ScopedDeltaPositionDebug Class Reference

This class records the difference in a position from its construction to its destruction, and adds an arrow to the debug triangle routines that visualises this delta. More...

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 ScopedDeltaPositionDebug (const Vector3 &pos, uint32 col=0x00ffffff)
 ~ScopedDeltaPositionDebug ()

Detailed Description

This class records the difference in a position from its construction to its destruction, and adds an arrow to the debug triangle routines that visualises this delta.
